subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: While the rest of the world may be gripped by the anticipation of an approaching World Cup, Italy is confronting anger and shame over the possibility that when it comes to its national passion, the fix was in.
snippet: While the rest of the world may be gripped by the anticipation of an approaching World Cup, Italy is confronting anger and shame over the possibility that when it comes to its national passion, the fix was in.
